name: Mystery Combat Man 4: The End of Time
summary: The conclusion to the multi-award-winning Mystery Combat Man Franchise, MCM4 strives to be the best sequel to the worst mod ever made! The Mystery Combat Squad returns to an absurdist world of action and intrigue. Following the events of MCM3, a mysterious disruptor has broken into the time bank, setting off a catastrophic chain of events that threatens the timeline of the planet of the Earth. Who could have done this, and why? Whoever he his, he must be tracked down and brought to justice at any cost, and it's all down to the Mystery Combat Man to hunt him down across the space-time continuum. Will he succeed? It's all up to you, the player, in... Mystery Combat Man 4: The End of Time!
